title: Siemens expands sustainable MV switchgear range - Your Gateway to Power Transmission & Distribution - T&D India
summary: Siemens Smart Infrastructure has expanded its range of sustainable and digital medium-voltage switchgear to support the decarbonization of power grids, particularly with the introduction of the F-gas-free blue GIS primary switchgear models 8DAB24 and upgraded NXPLUS C24. These innovations incorporate Clean Air and vacuum interrupter technology to reduce carbon footprints, emphasize sustainable energy transitions, and feature digital solutions to enhance operational efficiency.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is green innovation as Siemens is expanding its range of sustainable and digital medium-voltage switchgear, emphasizing 'F-gas-free' technology and 'Clean Air' principles to support decarbonization and promote eco-friendly energy distribution.
business_innovation: TRUE. This is a business innovation as Siemens has introduced new and improved sustainable medium-voltage switchgear products, showcasing technological advancements and a digital approach to enhance operational efficiency and address environmental concerns.
green_product: TRUE. This is a green product as Siemens' sustainable medium-voltage switchgear, such as the F-gas-free blue GIS models, aims to reduce environmental impact throughout its life cycle by using environmentally friendly materials, sustainable production processes, and promoting energy efficiency.
green_process: TRUE. This is a green process as Siemens employs sustainable manufacturing methods for its medium-voltage switchgear, including the use of Clean Air technology and vacuum interrupters to minimize environmental impacts, reduce waste, and promote sustainability.
product_or_process: Siemens medium-voltage switchgear models (e.g., 8DAB24, NXPLUS C24)
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 335313 - Switchgear and Switchboard Apparatus Manufacturing, 335314 - Relay and Industrial Control Manufacturing, 335999 - All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing, 541330 - Engineering Services
greenwashing: FALSE. This innovation does not appear to be an example of greenwashing as Siemens' focus on sustainable and eco-friendly features like 'Clean Air' technology and reduced carbon footprint align with genuine efforts towards environmental sustainability.
